languages.text: "Потому что тогда, вероятнее всего, процесс изменения станет необратим, а наше единственное оружие против него — бесполезным, ибо высвободившаяся энергия может стать розжигом для варп-энергий. Мне не доводилось видеть последствия бомбардировки демонических миров... но сведений об этих попытках хватает, чтобы настоятельно советовать воздержаться от подобного".

"For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."
languages.original_text: "Потому что тогда, вероятнее всего, процесс изменения станет необратим, а наше единственное оружие против него — бесполезным, ибо высвободившаяся энергия может стать розжигом для варп-энергий. Мне не доводилось видеть последствия бомбардировки демонических миров... но сведений об этих попытках хватает, чтобы настоятельно советовать воздержаться от подобного".

traits.locale_text: "For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment might stoke the warp vortex. I have never witnessed the consequences of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence: you do not want to see them."

"For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment might stoke the warp vortex. I have never witnessed the consequences of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence: you do not want to see them."

"For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

"For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

"For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

"For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

languages.text: "Aus dem einfachen Grund, dass der Transformationsprozess bald unumkehrbar wird und unsere einzige Waffe dagegen nutzlos. Die bei der Bombardierung freigesetzte Energie könnte die Warpenergien aufheizen. Ich habe die Folgen der Bombardierung einer Dämonenwelt noch nie erlebt ... aber es gibt genügend Beweise derartiger Versuche, um mit Bestimmtheit sagen zu können, dass Ihr das nicht sehen wollt."
languages.original_text: "For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

traits.locale_text: "Aus dem einfachen Grund, dass der Transformationsprozess bald unumkehrbar wird und unsere einzige Waffe dagegen nutzlos. Die bei der Bombardierung freigesetzte Energie könnte die Warpenergien aufheizen. Ich habe die Folgen der Bombardierung einer Dämonenwelt noch nie erlebt ... aber es gibt genügend Beweise derartiger Versuche, um mit Bestimmtheit sagen zu können, dass Ihr das nicht sehen wollt."

languages.text: « Pour la simple raison que le processus de transformation sera bientôt irréversible et que l'unique arme dont nous disposons pour le contrer est inutile. L'énergie libérée par le bombardement risquerait d'attiser les énergies du Warp. Je n'ai jamais vu de mes yeux ce qu'il se passe lorsque l'on bombarde un monde-démon... mais j'ai suffisamment d'éléments pour pouvoir affirmer qu'il vaut mieux ne pas en arriver là. »
languages.original_text: "For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

traits.locale_text: « Pour la simple raison que le processus de transformation sera bientôt irréversible et que l'unique arme dont nous disposons pour le contrer est inutile. L'énergie libérée par le bombardement risquerait d'attiser les énergies du Warp. Je n'ai jamais vu de mes yeux ce qu'il se passe lorsque l'on bombarde un monde-démon... mais j'ai suffisamment d'éléments pour pouvoir affirmer qu'il vaut mieux ne pas en arriver là. »

languages.text: “原因很简单，转化过程很快就会变得无法逆转，而我们唯一能阻止它的武器也会失去作用。爆炸会释放巨大能量，很可能会摧毁亚空间的屏障。我从来没亲眼目睹过轰炸恶魔世界会带来怎样的后果……但根据我所了解的事实，我可相当肯定地告诉你，你绝对不会想亲眼见证这样的后果。”
languages.original_text: "For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

traits.locale_text: “原因很简单，转化过程很快就会变得无法逆转，而我们唯一能阻止它的武器也会失去作用。爆炸会释放巨大能量，很可能会摧毁亚空间的屏障。我从来没亲眼目睹过轰炸恶魔世界会带来怎样的后果……但根据我所了解的事实，我可相当肯定地告诉你，你绝对不会想亲眼见证这样的后果。”

languages.text: 「間もなく変形プロセスの撤回ができなくなり、それに対抗する唯一の武器が使えなくなるというシンプルな理由です。爆撃のエネルギーが<歪み>のエネルギーに火をくべる可能性もあります。悪魔惑星を爆撃した後どうなるのかは見たことはありませんが…絶対に見たくはないと思われるようなものです」
languages.original_text: "For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

traits.locale_text: 「もうすぐ変形プロセスの撤回ができなくなって、それに対抗する唯一の武器が使えなくなるっていうシンプルな理由だ。爆撃のエネルギーが<歪み>のエネルギーに火をくべる可能性もある。悪魔惑星を爆撃した後どうなるのかは見たことがないが…絶対に見たくはないものだろう」
「間もなく変形プロセスの撤回ができなくなり、それに対抗する唯一の武器が使えなくなるというシンプルな理由です。爆撃のエネルギーが<歪み>のエネルギーに火をくべる可能性もあります。悪魔惑星を爆撃した後どうなるのかは見たことはありませんが…絶対に見たくはないと思われるようなものです」

languages.text: «Por la simple razón de que el proceso de transformación está a punto de ser irreversible y nuestras armas no nos servirán para defendernos. La energía que genere el bombardeo podría avivar las energías de la disformidad. Nunca he sido testigo de las consecuencias de bombardear un mundo daemon... pero tengo pruebas suficientes de intentos anteriores para afirmar que es algo que no quiere presenciar».
languages.original_text: "For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

traits.locale_text: «Por la simple razón de que el proceso de transformación está a punto de ser irreversible y nuestras armas no nos servirán para defendernos. La energía que genere el bombardeo podría avivar las energías de la disformidad. Nunca he sido testigo de las consecuencias de bombardear un mundo daemon... pero tengo pruebas suficientes de intentos anteriores para afirmar que es algo que no quiere presenciar».

languages.text: "Gayet basit, dönüşüm süreci yakında geri döndürülemez bir hâl alacak ve tek silahımız da işe yaramaz hâle gelecek. Bombardımanın enerjisi, öteboyut enerjilerini körükleyebilir. Daha önce bir iblis dünyasını bombalamanın akıbetine hiç tanık olmadım ama... Bu tür teşebbüslere dair edindiğim kanıtlar ışığında net söyleyebilirim ki sonuçlarını görmek istemeyiz."
languages.original_text: "For the simple reason that the transformation process will soon become irreversible and our sole weapon against it useless. The energy released by the bombardment could stoke the warp energies. I have never witnessed the aftermath of bombing a daemon world before... but there is enough evidence of such attempts for me to say with confidence that you do not want to see it."

traits.locale_text: "Gayet basit, dönüşüm süreci yakında geri döndürülemez bir hâl alacak ve tek silahımız işe yaramaz hâle gelecek. Bombardımanın enerjisi, öteboyut enerjilerini körükleyebilir. Daha önce bir iblis dünyasını bombalamanın akıbetine hiç tanık olmadım ama... Bu tür teşebbüslerin sonuçlarını görmek istemeyeceğinizi tasvip etmeye yetecek kanıtlar mevcut."
